document.full_text: two private polls showed ecuador's leftist leader, rafael correa, comfortably won saturday's referendum on judicial and media reforms that opponents say are a power-grab threatening the andean nation's democracy.
document.title: polls show vote victory for ecuador's correa
lines_and_colors: two private polls showed ecuador's leftist leader, rafael correa, comfortably won saturday's referendum on judicial and media reforms that opponents say are a power-grab threatening the andean nation's democracy.
